summary: Just a import from Oblivion with a few tweaks of my greatswords resource into a useable craftable silverswords in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Runed silver greatswords
Picture shows all not much to say.

Crafted under Jewelery 
Requires
5 gold ingots
5 silver ingots
1 flawless sapphire
1 grand soulgem(filled)

Two versions slim blade and wide blade(no difference in damage just looks).
Damage about the same as Default Silver greatswords
BUT.
Swings slightly faster.
Has slightly greater range.
Heavy knockback(on par with warhammers)
Has a damage bonus agasint all supernatural creatures in Skyrim not just undead and warewolves.
This includes Dragons, and that damage bonus is slightly higher then default silver swords.

Either use Nexus mod manager or unzip into your data dir and enable Runedsilvergreatsword.esp
author: Phoynix
